title: #228 - We Need A Philosophy Of Policing
description: Dan had big plans to do an episode all about different philosophers thoughts on police and how police should function in a well-run society. But he was dismayed to find that very few philosophers had even touched the subject over the centuries. So, instead, he and Connor delve into a wide-ranging discussion of why this might be the case, what a philosophy of policing might look like, and why it's so important that we have one.
